# The `DenseMapInfo` Struct Template Reference

An information struct used to provide <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap</a> with the various necessary components for a given value type <code>T</code>. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

An information struct used to provide <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap</a> with the various necessary components for a given value type <code>T</code>.

<code>Enable</code> is an optional additional parameter that is used to support SFINAE (generally using std::enable&#95;if&#95;t) in derived <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/densemapinfo">DenseMapInfo</a> specializations; in non-SFINAE use cases this should just be <code>void</code>.

Definition at line 52 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/densemapinfo-h">DenseMapInfo.h</a>.
